_sText:
About the map: ============= This map is based on the steam game Portal. You will face many challenges in this map, every single idea is based on the portal concept, you will even be rewarded with a peace of cake, if you advance and complete the quests. Good luck, and please spread the word. I'ts time for a real map! Author Notes: ============= Dear Community. Please let me know what you think about this map. Rate it fair, and send me your constructive criticism. I've spend many months on this, so to clear it out, please let me know your server ip if added to your maps list. **Thank you** My Website ========== If you need help mapping, go ask here!

www.learn2map.net

Copyrights ========== **TEXTURES USED IN THIS MAP IS A RECREATION INSPIRED FROM THE GAME PORTAL. THE CONTENTS OF THE MATERIALS IS NOT COPY PASTED AND EXTRACTED.**
